Verses: 1 annaatkalile, Seeshargal Peruginabodhu, Grekkaraanavargal, Thangal Vidhavaigal Andraadaga Visaaranaiyil Thittamaai Visaarikkappadavillaiyendru, Ebireyarukku Virodhamaai Murumuruththaargal.
2 appozhudhu Panniruvarum Seesharkoottaththai Varavazhaiththu: Naangal Dheva Vasanaththaip Podhiyaamal, Pandhivisaaranai Seyvadhu Thagudhiyalla.
3 aadhalaal Sagodharare, Parisuththa Aaviyum Gnaanamum Niraindhu, Narsaatchi Petrirukkira Ezhuperai Ungalil Therindhukollungal; Avargalai Indha Velaikkaaga Erpaduththuvom.
4 naangalo Jebampannuvadhilum Dhevavasanaththaip Podhikkira Oozhiyaththilum Idaividaamal Thariththiruppom Endraargal.

5 indha Yosanai Sabaiyaarellaarukkum Piriyamaayirundhadhu. Appozhudhu Visuvaasamum Parisuththa Aaviyum Niraindhavanaagiya Sthevaanaiyum, Pilippaiyum, Pirokoraiyum, Nikkaanoraiyum, Theemonaiyum, Parmenaavaiyum, Yoodhamaarkkaththamaindhavanaana Andhiyogiyaa Pattanaththaanaagiya Nikkolaavaiyum Therindhukondu,
6 avargalai Apposthalarukku Munbaaga Niruththinaargal. Ivargal Jebampanni, Avargalmel Kaigalai Vaiththaargal.
7 dhevavasanam Viruththiyadaindhadhu; Seesharudaiya Thogai Erusalemil Migavum Perugitru; Aasaariyargalil Anegar Visuvaasaththukkuk Keezhppadindhaargal.
8 sthevaan Visuvaasaththinaalum Vallamaiyinaalum Niraindhavanaai Janangalukkulle Periya Arpudhangalaiyum Adaiyaalangalaiyum Seydhaan.

9 appozhudhu Liparththeenar Ennappattavargalin Aalayaththaich Serndhavargalilum, Sirene Pattanaththaarilum, Aleksandhiriyaa Pattanaththaarilum, Silisiyaa Naattaarilum, Aasiyaa Dhesaththaarilum Silar Ezhumbi, Sthevaanudane Tharkkampanninaargal.
10 avan Pesina Gnaanaththaiyum Aaviyaiyum Ethirththunirka Avargalaal Koodaamarpoyitru.
11 appozhudhu Avargal: Mosekkum Dhevanukkum Virodhamaaga Ivan Dhooshana Vaarththaigalaip Pesakkettom Endru Sollumpadiyaaga Manusharai Erpaduththi;
12 janangalaiyum Moopparaiyum Vedhapaaragaraiyum Ezhuppivittu; Avanmel Paaindhu, Avanaip Pidiththu, Aalosanai Sangaththaarukku Munbaaga Izhuththukkondupoi;
13 poisaatchigalaiyum Niruththinaargal. Ivargal: Indha Manushan Indhap Parisuththa Sthalaththukkum Vedhappiramaanaththukkum Virodhamaagath Dhooshana Vaarththaigalai Oyaamar Pesugiraan;
14 eppadiyendraal Nasareyanaagiya Andha Yesu Indha Sthalaththai Azhiththuppottu, Mose Namakkuk Koduththa Muraimaigalai Maatruvaanendru Ivan Sollak Kettom Endraargal.
15 aalosanai Sangaththil Utkaarndhirundha Anaivarum Avanmel Kannokkamaayirundhu, Avan Mugam Dhevathoodhan Mugampolirukkak Kandaargal.
